summary: All requirements from the BuildRequest have been successfully implemented. The 'institution' course has been removed from the backend courses map, migration module, and frontend course image utility. The course no longer appears in any listings as evidenced by the modified PublicHomepage showing only basic, advanced, and meditation courses.

hallucinated_features.description: Migration module with runtime course filtering functionality
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest specified updating the migration module to remove the 'institution' course from course definitions, but did not request the creation of a new migration.mo file with runtime filtering logic. The requirement was to update an existing migration module, not create a new one with a run() function that filters courses at runtime.
